scripts.build: pnpm clean; pnpm build:cjs && pnpm build:esm
scripts.rename:js:cjs: find ./dist -type f -name "*.js" ! -name "*.cjs" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do mv "$file" "${file%.js}.cjs"; done && find ./dist -type f -name "*.js.map" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do mv "$file" "${file%.js.map}.cjs.map"; done
scripts.rename:js:mjs: find ./dist -type f -name "*.js" ! -name "*.mjs" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do mv "$file" "${file%.js}.mjs"; done && find ./dist -type f -name "*.js.map" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do mv "$file" "${file%.js.map}.mjs.map"; done
